params._value: Value of the transaction in Ether

params._feeCollector: Address of the new fee collector

changeRatio(address,address,uint256).details: Logswhen rigoblock dao changes fee split.

params._vaultDao: Address of the new vault dao

createVault(address,address,string,strin.details: Logs a new Vault creation by factory

params._name: String of the name of the new vault
params._symbol: String of the symbol of the new vault
params._vaultId: Number of the new vault Id

params._revenue: Value of the transaction in Ether

setTransactionFee(address,address,uint25.details: Logs a modification of the transaction fee event

params._transactionFee: Value of the transaction fee in basis points
